Classes in org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg used by org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.mgmt.util

Classes in org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg used by org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg
Address
          Implementation of addresses used in the EPC Message/Transport Bindings (MTB).
Clients
          Clients manages the inforamtion about registered clients.
CommandDispatcher
          The command dispatcher dispatches the commands by invoking the methods on the ReaderDevice and creates the response.
Context
           
HttpSenderHandshakeMessage
          Class used for handshaking.
IncomingMessage
          IncomingMessage holds connection and a message received through this connection.
IncomingMessageBuffer
          IncomingMessageBuffer is a buffer that stores IncomingMessage It is added to each client connection as a listener, so that it can be notified if there is a new message.
IncomingMessageListener
          IncomingMessageListener is an interface that has to be implemented by all classes that are interested in the incoming messages.
MessageDispatcher
          The ServiceDispatcher receives plain messages in XML or TEXT format from the IncomingMessageBuffer.
MessageFactory
          Singleton factory class which creates the concrete instances of a MessageParser and a MessageSerializer.
MessageFormat
          This is a helper class because there are no Enums in Java 1.4.
MessageLayer
          MessageLayer is the main class.
MessageLayer.AgentType
          The agent type enum
MessageLayerConfiguration
          Loads the configuration properties for the MessageLayer from the property file.
MessageParser
          A MessageParser parses a messages into the intermediate representation (IR) used by the CommandDispatcher.
MessageParsingException
          Exception which is thrown if the parsing could not be processed successfully.
MessageSerializer
          A MessageSerializer serializes the intermediate representation (IR) of a Reply into a String message.
MessageSerializingException
          Exception which is thrown if the serializing could not be processed successfully.
NotificationChannelConnections
          This class is used as a pool for notification channel connections.
NotificationListener
          NotificationListener is an interface that has to be implemented by all classes that are interested in the notification messages.
OutgoingMessageBuffer
          OutgoingMessageBuffer is a buffer consisting of messages that has to be sent to a client (called "host" in the EPC Reader Protocol).
OutgoingMessageDispatcher
          OutgoingMessageDispatcher sends a message to a given client (called "host" in the EPC Reader Protocol).
ReadReportNotificationListener
          Implementation of the interface NotificationListener.
ReceiverHandshakeMessage
          Class used for handshaking.
SenderHandshakeMessage
          Class used for handshaking.
TcpSenderHandshakeMessage
          Class used for handshaking.
